connector.description: Send requests to SAP NetWeaver Gateway using HTTP.

camel.sink.path.url.name: camel.sink.path.url
camel.sink.path.url.description: Url to the SAP net-weaver gateway server.

camel.sink.endpoint.flatternMap.name: camel.sink.endpoint.flatternMap
camel.sink.endpoint.flatternMap.description: If the JSON Map contains only a single entry, then flattern by storing that single entry value as the message body.

camel.sink.endpoint.json.name: camel.sink.endpoint.json
camel.sink.endpoint.json.description: Whether to return data in JSON format. If this option is false, then XML is returned in Atom format.

camel.sink.endpoint.jsonAsMap.name: camel.sink.endpoint.jsonAsMap
camel.sink.endpoint.jsonAsMap.description: To transform the JSON from a String to a Map in the message body.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.sap-netweaver.lazyStartP.name: camel.component.sap-netweaver.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.sap-netweaver.lazyStartP.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.sap-netweaver.autowiredE.name: camel.component.sap-netweaver.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.sap-netweaver.autowiredE.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.
